post.summary:
DeleteAccount permanently deletes the user account.
Uses POST instead of DELETE to support request body with password confirmation.

get.summary: ExportUserData exports all user data (GDPR compliance).

post.summary: ForgotPassword initiates the password reset flow.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: ForgotPasswordRequest contains the email for password reset.

post.summary: GoogleCallback handles the Google OAuth callback.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: GoogleCallbackRequest contains the OAuth callback code.

get.summary: GoogleLogin returns the Google OAuth login URL.

post.summary: Login authenticates a user and returns tokens.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: LogoutRequest contains the session to terminate.

post.summary: LogoutAll terminates all sessions for a user.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: LogoutAllRequest contains the user ID for bulk logout.

get.summary: GetProfile retrieves the current user's profile.

put.summary: UpdateProfile updates the current user's profile.

post.summary: Register creates a new user account.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: ResendVerificationRequest contains the email to resend verification to.

post.summary: ResetPassword completes the password reset flow.

get.summary: ListSessions returns all sessions for the authenticated user.

delete.summary: RevokeOtherSessions revokes all sessions except the current one.

post.summary: VerifyEmail verifies the user's email address.

get.summary: GetDashboard retrieves the user's dashboard data.
ListHabits returns all habits for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: CreateHabitRequest contains data for creating a habit.

get.summary: GetHabit retrieves a habit by ID.
GetHabitLogs retrieves logs for a habit.
ListNotifications returns notifications for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: CreateNotificationRequest contains data for creating a notification.

post.summary: MarkAllAsRead marks all notifications as read.

get.summary: GetUnreadCount returns the count of unread notifications.

post.summary: MarkAsRead marks a notification as read.

HabitsServiceLogHabitBody.description: LogHabitRequest contains data for logging habit completion.

HabitsServiceUpdateHabitBody.description: UpdateHabitRequest contains data for updating a habit.

HabitsServiceUpdateHabitLogBody.description: UpdateHabitLogRequest contains data for updating a habit log.

protobufNullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.

v1CreateHabitRequest.description: CreateHabitRequest contains data for creating a habit.

type.description: Notification type as string (streak_milestone, habit_reminder, etc.).

v1CreateNotificationRequest.description: CreateNotificationRequest contains data for creating a notification.

dayName.description: Day of week name (Mon, Tue, etc.).

logsCount.description: Number of habit logs on this day.

v1DailyAnalytics.description: DailyAnalytics contains analytics for a single day.

v1ForgotPasswordRequest.description: ForgotPasswordRequest contains the email for password reset.

code.description: The authorization code from Google OAuth callback.

v1GoogleCallbackRequest.description: GoogleCallbackRequest contains the OAuth callback code.

v1GoogleLoginData.description: GoogleLoginData contains the Google OAuth URL.

reminderTime.description: Daily reminder time in HH:MM format.

v1HabitLog.description: HabitLog represents a habit completion log entry.

v1LogHabitData.description: LogHabitData contains the created log ID.

v1LogHabitResponse.description: LogHabitResponse contains the created log ID.

v1LoginData.description: LoginData contains authentication tokens and session info.

userId.description: User ID whose sessions should be terminated.

v1LogoutAllRequest.description: LogoutAllRequest contains the user ID for bulk logout.

v1LogoutRequest.description: LogoutRequest contains the session to terminate.

v1Meta.description: Meta contains metadata for the response.

isRead.description: Whether the notification has been read.

v1NotificationType.description:
NotificationType represents the type of notification.

 - NOTIFICATION_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified notification type.
 - NOTIFICATION_TYPE_STREAK_MILESTONE: Streak milestone notification.
 - NOTIFICATION_TYPE_HABIT_REMINDER: Habit reminder notification.
 - NOTIFICATION_TYPE_ACHIEVEMENT: Achievement notification.
 - NOTIFICATION_TYPE_SYSTEM: System notification.
 - NOTIFICATION_TYPE_WELCOME: Welcome notification.

hasPreviousPage.description: Whether there is a previous page.

hasNextPage.description: Whether there is a next page.

totalData.description: Total number of items across all pages.

totalDataInCurrentPage.description: Number of items in the current page.

from.description: Index of the first item in the current page (1-indexed).

to.description: Index of the last item in the current page.

v1PaginationResponse.description: PaginationResponse contains pagination metadata for list responses.

timezone.description: User's timezone in IANA format (e.g., Asia/Jakarta).

v1RegisterData.description: RegisterData contains the registered user information.

v1RegisterResponse.description: RegisterResponse contains the result of registration.

email.description: Email address to resend verification to.

v1ResendVerificationRequest.description: ResendVerificationRequest contains the email to resend verification to.

revokedCount.description: Number of sessions that were revoked.

v1RevokeOtherSessionsResponse.description: RevokeOtherSessionsResponse contains the count of revoked sessions.

isActive.description: Whether the session is currently active.

isCurrent.description: Whether this is the current session.

v1UnreadCountResponse.description: UnreadCountResponse contains the unread notification count.

days.description: Daily analytics for each day of the week.

averageCompletion.description: Average completion percentage for the week.
